info.name: TechNova Support API
info.description:
API collection for TechNova Support API - Create ServiceNow incidents, send Slack notifications, and create GitHub issues.

## Base URLs
- **Local Development:** http://localhost:8000
- **Production:** https://technova-api.25rfx7vtssv6.eu-gb.codeengine.appdomain.cloud

## Getting Started
1. Start the API locally: `python -m uvicorn api.main:app --reload`
2. Import this collection into Postman
3. Set the `base_url` variable to your target environment
4. Test the endpoints!

item.name: Lookup Endpoints
item.description: These endpoints return reference data needed when creating incidents.

request.description: Get a list of available ServiceNow assignment groups. Use these values in the `assignment_group` field when creating an incident.
Get a list of available incident categories. Use these values in the `incident_category` field when creating an incident.

Get a list of available impact values. Use these values in the `impact_value` field when creating an incident.

- **1** = Enterprise (Entire company affected)
- **2** = Department (Department/business unit affected)
- **3** = Multiple Users (Several users affected)
- **4** = Single User (Only one user affected)

response.name: Impacts Response

request.description:
Get a list of available urgency values. Use these values in the `urgency_value` field when creating an incident.

- **1** = Critical (Work cannot continue, no workaround)
- **2** = High (Significant impact, limited workaround)
- **3** = Medium (Moderate impact, workaround available)
- **4** = Low (Minor inconvenience, can wait)

request.description:
Create a new support incident in ServiceNow.

This endpoint:
1. Creates a new incident in ServiceNow
2. Sends a notification to the configured Slack channel
3. Creates a GitHub issue if a stack trace is detected in the description

## Required Fields
- `short_description` (string): Brief summary of the issue (max 160 chars)
- `urgency_value` (string): Urgency level (1-4)

## Optional Fields
- `description` (string): Detailed description of the issue
- `impact_value` (string): Impact level (1-4)
- `assignment_group` (string): Team to assign the incident to
- `incident_category` (string): Category of the incident
- `caller_username` (string): Username/email of the person reporting
